attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
with gas and electric prices to soar by 40& each soon how can people on income support cope with this its bad enough just now with all the latest price increses i have gone from £10 a week to £25 a week as it stands just now and i will not be able to pay my fuel bills in future unless i just dont eat fuel suppliers were constantly incressing there prices when the cost of fuel was low what did the do with all the money they made during this long period 
iam registered disabled and i need to be on a strict diet which cost more and with food prices also incressing i will no longer be able to afford this as well therefor my health will get worse it is a struggle from day to day at the moment i undestand the goverment gave us all who are on income support out yearly rise but this was all taken up by the incress in council tax 
also i have tried to email the prime minister but the email site has been down for some time i wonder why this has happened

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
